AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Incubator Baby
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In a week the embrio of a Nyaron grows to 12 years old in the incubator. All memories are imprinted through mechanites.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is The chief of a wandering group of nyarons. There are no laws or rules, Nyarons only follow the strongest.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s memories contained knowlage of various weapons, tactics and nyan-nyan martial arts. Even the weapons she touches while fighting on the battlefield seem so familiar to her.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Dancer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a dance machine. I think it's much better than watching a boring cathode ray tube.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Idol Trainee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was being shipped to appear on an ambitious TV program by a major space agency. The plan was canceled due to an unfortunate accident, but she still thinks it was produced by the agency.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Rat Hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was good at handling guns and never returned empty-handed when hunting. But every time she comes back late at night, she enjoys playing with her prey, especially poor rats.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Police
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was drafted by the police because there was not enough people to handle "security" in the big city. Most police had families to support, so the night shift was left to junk security robots or [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Expedition Crew
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of an expedition investigating the dangerous places. How she ended up here is a mystery.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Custom-ordered maid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was to spend a rosy day with her owner at "The Empire", the most social club in the universe. Although she did not meet him, she will find a new owner in this world.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Patissier Cat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Somewhere in the universe, bakeries use cats as staff. [PAWN_nameDef] was scheduled to be delivered to one of the store's franchises.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Abandoned Cat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Unable to withstand the violence of her owner, [PAWN_nameDef] hid in a regular cargo ship to "abandon" herself.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Mobile Strike crew
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once part of a Nyaron Strike crew, an elite team of Nyaron soldiers aboard spceships.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Nurse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to care for the injured and ill. [PAWN_nameDef] was slated for a transfer to a prestigious glitterworld hospital when her transport was attacked and diverted to their base.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Builder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to be a Nyaron Builder, a rare assignment for her species. She is part of a special group assigned to handle the most difficult parts of any given construction project due to her unique abilities.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nyaron Sellsword
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loves money.She was left behind on an unknown planet due to some kind of incident, but her purpose is the same as before.
